posts.title: Software Development
posts.author: Jeremy Marube
posts.content: Software development is the process of designing, building, testing, and maintaining computer programs, apps, and systems. It involves both the technical (coding, architecture) and creative (problem-solving, design) aspects of building software

posts.title: Cyber security
posts.author: Job
posts.content: Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and data from digital attacks. These attacks are usually aimed at accessing, changing, or destroying sensitive information; extorting money; or interrupting normal business processes.
